data.actual_result: Will display option box two times
data.expected_result: Only display option box one time
data.short_description: Spamming your screen on the ‘Find or start a conversation’ bar and a random server icon will pop-up the “Server Settings, Notification settings, leave server” bar two times
data.steps_to_repro: - Spam your screen where the bar says “ Find or start a conversation “ and a random server icon
